name: B.A.P Matoki Icons
css: @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')  {.new_post_label {-webkit-text-stroke:0 !important;color:rgba(0,0,0,0) !important;opacity:1 !important;top: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px;}.new_post_label:hover {-webkit-text-stroke:0 !important;color:rgba(0,0,0,0) !important;opacity:1 !important;top: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px;}.post.is_mine.with_avatar.new_post {background: url(http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v246/miyaviusa/choomtopthemes/bap/bg.png);background-position: center bottom !important;background-repeat:repeat !important;}.new_post_label .new_post_label_icon {background-image: url('http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v246/miyaviusa/choomtopthemes/bap/icons.png') !important;background-repeat: no-repeat; position: absolute; display: block; background-size: auto !important; top: 5px !important; left: 0px !important; opacity:.9 !important;}.new_post_label:hover .new_post_label_icon:hover{opacity: 1.0 !important;}#new_post .arrow {background: none!important;width: 0px!important;height: 0px!important;border-right: solid 9px rgba(31,31,31,1)!important;border-bottom:9px solid transparent!important;border-left: 2px solid transparent!important;border-top: 9px solid transparent!important;margin-top: 0!important;}}
